price: Everyone will come, accompanied by an angel to drive him and another to testify[13].
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ
footnotes: [13] i.e., one driving him for Judgment and another as a witness for his deeds.
